Description:
Some careers shine brighter than others.If you’re looking for a career that will help you stand out, join HSBC and fulfil your potential. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.HSBC is one of the largest banking and financial services organisations in the world, with operations in 64 countries and territories. We aim to be where the growth is, enabling businesses to thrive and economies to prosper, and, ultimately, helping people to fulfil their hopes and realise their ambitions.We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team in the role of Senior Software Engineer.In this role, you will:End-to-end Appian (BPM, Workflow) application development (like design, build, test & deploy)
Collaborate with architects, developers, project managers to deliver suitable solution which can cope with the business need.
Research and evaluate products in support of the technical strategy. Study, design and implement new infrastructure technology according to the standard and governance. Help to develop the technical competence of other teammates in new technology.
Ensure a high quality standard of deliverables according to HSBC standards and best practices
Prepare project-related documentation and provide support on compliance and audit checking
·      Project relevant documentation, ensure compliance and audit policies are strictly followed.Job Details
